title: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Escambia County Sheriff's Office)

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Escambia County Sheriff's Office)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

communications.subject: [Records Center] Welcome to the Records Center!
communications.communication:
Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau, 
 
Thank you for registering with ECSO Public Records Center. 
 
Your Login ID is:  149204-22929945@requests.muckrock.com 
 
If you did not submit your request through the public portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you where you can track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request. 
 
 
If you have never used this system or cannot remember your password you may request a temporary password here: Request Temporary Password (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=6HtRfOYLt5fXvpttM-2FU1HSMgi4dn39U5Z9Bgwcwb4bh2hV-2F2H39JMHRFIixlOUrK5LmhTnhAtLxiRdyOx-2BbgX3JA3y1TujiSmTjGc-2BtSiKU-3DonD8_Qsrp1zPpB58BiLdUelLKEzGYM8113Y7E-2BN-2FWqlxkOxmYwY7bON7OmfIvOoJcGqjAKIYf-2BMiCz6e-2BzG1Bhjd9HcJtmKaij5nm-2B6mnMrWwj-2FQ971Dr4ZaPFosPtUPiP-2FGlFIc-2BbFjdBUro49iHweF1jRFzD68bbgrHDLThG-2FsJtFEn9Ige-2F2YxbFtzizSdu0Gi3P7FBMgRFSeEurXPwrq6IBJvISVgv-2BSUT-2BcW98-2FJW1o-3D) 
 
Please login to "My Request Center" to update your account information, track the status of your request and receive requested records when they become available. This is an auto-generated email and has originated from an unmonitored email account. Please DO NOT REPLY

communications.subject: Public Records Request :: P052380-071623
communications.communication:
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau: 
Thank you for your interest in public records of Escambia County Sheriff's Office (ECSO). Per F.S.S. 119, this e-mail is to notify you that we have received your public records request on 7/16/2023 and have assigned a reference number P052380-071623 for tracking purposes. Records Requested: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fescambia-county-sheriffs-office-538%252Fvehicular-pursuit-policies-escambia-county-sheriffs-office-149204%252F%253Femail%253DPublicRecords%252540escambiaso.com&url_auth_token=AAAc5knMKvomH2wWVsFiXgUQXhU%3A1qLEBk%3Ajfsra7WuJqcpXFEdm0L73cAfab6CpYzjxClG0s6ig5A 
Your request will be processed in accordance with Florida Public Records Laws and in the order in which it was received. You will be advised as soon as possible regarding any estimated costs, if applicable. Payment will be due in advance by business check, cashier’s check, cash or money order made payable to the Escambia County Sheriff’s Office, attention Record’s Office. 
-Escambia County Sheriff's Office

communications.subject: [Records Center] Public Records Request :: P052380-071623
communications.communication:
--- Please respond above this line --- 
07/19/2023 

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau 
MuckRock News, DEPT MR149204 263 Huntington Ave 
Boston MA 02115 

Re:  Public Records Request No. P052380-071623 

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau: 
The Escambia County Sheriff’s Office is in receipt of your request for public records received on 7/16/2023 in which you requested: 
“All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).” 
The responsive records can be located under "Trending Topics" on the (as well as all of our other policies). Please refer to General Order #525 - Emergency - Response and Pursuit. CHIP W. SIMMONS, SHERIFF 
ESCAMBIA COUNTY SHERIFF’S OFFICE 
Elizabeth Shreves, FCRM 
Public Records Manager/RMLO
